data.title: St. Andrew Catholic Church
data.meta_description: St. Andrew Catholic Church - Home page
data.text:
The Parish Office is open from Monday through Friday from 9 AM to 4 PM (closed on holidays).

The Hispanic Ministry Office is open Monday, Wednesday and Thursday from 9 AM to 2 PM and Tuesdays from 2 PM to 7 PM.

Oficina del Ministerio Hispano abierta los lunes, mi√©rcoles y jueves de 9 AM a 2 PM y martes de 2 PM a 7 PM.

Keep informed! You can connect with us in different ways:

1. Download our Parish App

scan this QR code with your smart phone and follow the prompts.

2. Signup to receive our newsletter. Click here

3. Check our Parish bulletin

4. Follow us on Facebook

5. Continue visiting our website regularly

Are you an adult needing the Sacraments? Classes begin on August 25. Register today!Learn more

Adoration Guardians Needed on Thursdays from 6-7 PM. Please consider spending one hour per week with Jesus in the Blessed Sacrament. If interested in more information, contact Bonnie Petrukovich at bpetrukovich@gmail.com.

St. Andrew Catholic Church

675 Riverside RD | Roswell, GA 30075

770-641-9720

frontdesk@standrewcatholic.org

Fax: 770-641-8584

After Hours

If you need a priest due to a death in the family or a medical emergency requiring the Sacrament of Anointing of the Sick, please call 770-641-9720 Ext. 248.

St. Vincent de Paul Help Line

For food and/or financial assistance call 678-892-6163.
